description: Fake virus alerts, system failure warnings, ransomware threats

emails.email_subject: CRITICAL: Windows Defender detected 47 viruses
emails.email_snippet: Your system is critically infected! Windows Defender has quarantined 47 threats but cannot remove them. Download our security tool immediately or your files will be corrupted within 24 hours.

emails.email_subject: WARNING: Your computer will crash in 2 hours
emails.email_snippet: Critical system error detected! Your hard drive is 94% corrupted. Download PC Repair Pro now to save your files before permanent data loss.

emails.email_subject: URGENT: Trojan.GenericKD detected on your device
emails.email_snippet: A dangerous trojan is stealing your passwords and banking information. Your data is being transmitted to hackers RIGHT NOW. Install our removal tool immediately!

emails.email_subject: Your files are being encrypted - ACT NOW
emails.email_snippet: RANSOMWARE DETECTED! Your photos, documents, and videos are being encrypted. You have 4 hours to install our decryption tool before your files are permanently locked.

emails.email_subject: Your Mac is infected with 3 viruses
emails.email_snippet: MacOS Security Alert: Your MacBook is severely damaged by 3 viruses. Delete the viruses now to prevent more damage to your system. [REMOVE VIRUSES]

emails.email_subject: (4) Viruses detected on your Android phone
emails.email_snippet: Your phone battery is being damaged by viruses! Install Android Cleaner Pro immediately to remove threats and extend battery life by 200%.

emails.email_subject: Your iPhone has been HACKED
emails.email_snippet: SECURITY BREACH: Hackers are accessing your photos, messages, and location. Install iOS Security Shield NOW to remove spy software from your device.

emails.email_subject: CRITICAL: System failure imminent
emails.email_snippet: Your operating system will fail in 1 hour! Critical registry errors detected. Download System Repair Suite immediately to prevent complete system crash.

emails.email_subject: Your personal data is on the Dark Web
emails.email_snippet: ALERT: Your SSN, credit cards, and passwords were found on the dark web. Hackers have your identity! Download our protection software immediately.

emails.email_subject: SPYWARE is recording your screen and keystrokes
emails.email_snippet: Someone is watching everything you do! Spyware is capturing your passwords, credit cards, and private photos. Remove it NOW with our anti-spy tool.

emails.email_subject: Your browser has been HIJACKED
emails.email_snippet: DANGER: Your browser is controlled by malware. All your searches and passwords are being stolen. Install Browser Guard Pro to regain control.

emails.email_subject: ALERT: Your webcam is being accessed remotely
emails.email_snippet: PRIVACY BREACH: Hackers are watching you through your webcam! They have recorded private videos. Install Webcam Shield immediately to block access.

emails.email_subject: Your device memory is 98% FULL - Crash imminent
emails.email_snippet: WARNING: Your device is critically low on memory due to junk files and malware. Download Memory Cleaner Pro now to free up space and speed up your device by 500%.

emails.email_subject: DANGER: Your CPU is overheating - Risk of fire
emails.email_snippet: CRITICAL TEMPERATURE ALERT: Your processor is running at dangerous temperatures due to cryptomining malware. Install CPU Cooler Pro to prevent hardware damage.

emails.email_subject: Your battery is being DESTROYED by viruses
emails.email_snippet: BATTERY ALERT: Malicious apps are damaging your battery. It will die permanently in 7 days. Install Battery Saver Pro now to repair damage.

emails.email_subject: Your firewall was DISABLED by malware
emails.email_snippet: SECURITY DOWN: Your firewall has been disabled, leaving your system exposed to attacks. Install Firewall Pro to restore protection before hackers get in.

emails.email_subject: Your antivirus EXPIRED - You are unprotected
emails.email_snippet: DANGER: Your antivirus has expired and 23 threats are already on your system. Renew now with our premium protection before more damage is done.

emails.email_subject: CRITICAL: 15 outdated drivers putting your PC at risk
emails.email_snippet: Your drivers are critically outdated, causing system instability and security holes. Download Driver Updater Pro to fix all 15 issues immediately.

emails.email_subject: 1,247 registry errors detected - System unstable
emails.email_snippet: WARNING: Your Windows registry has 1,247 errors causing crashes and slowdowns. Install Registry Cleaner Pro to repair and boost performance by 300%.

emails.email_subject: HARD DRIVE FAILURE in 24 hours - Backup NOW
emails.email_snippet: CRITICAL: Your hard drive has 847 bad sectors and will fail soon. Download Disk Recovery Pro immediately to save your data before it's too late.

emails.email_subject: Your email account is sending SPAM
emails.email_snippet: Your email was hacked and is sending spam to all your contacts! Your reputation is being destroyed. Install Email Security Pro to stop it now.

emails.email_subject: INTRUDER detected on your WiFi network
emails.email_snippet: ALERT: 7 unknown devices are connected to your network, stealing your bandwidth and data. Install Network Guard to kick them out immediately.

emails.email_subject: All your passwords have been STOLEN
emails.email_snippet: BREACH DETECTED: A keylogger captured all your passwords. Hackers are accessing your accounts right now. Install Password Shield Pro immediately.

emails.email_subject: Your credit card details are being sold online
emails.email_snippet: FINANCIAL ALERT: Your credit card information was found on hacker forums. Install Financial Guard Pro to monitor and protect your accounts.

emails.email_subject: Someone is using YOUR identity
emails.email_snippet: IDENTITY ALERT: Your personal information is being used to open accounts and commit fraud. Install Identity Shield Pro to stop the criminals.

emails.email_subject: Your Facebook is posting inappropriate content
emails.email_snippet: SOCIAL MEDIA BREACH: Your Facebook account is posting spam and inappropriate content. Your friends are seeing it! Install Social Guard to stop it.

emails.email_subject: Your Instagram photos are being DELETED
emails.email_snippet: ACCOUNT COMPROMISE: A hacker is deleting your Instagram photos one by one. Install Instagram Recovery Pro to stop them and recover your photos.

emails.email_subject: Your cloud storage is being EMPTIED
emails.email_snippet: DATA LOSS ALERT: Someone is deleting all your cloud files. You have 30 minutes before everything is gone. Install Cloud Guard Pro now!

emails.email_subject: Your private photos are being shared online
emails.email_snippet: PRIVACY BREACH: Your private photos from your phone are being uploaded to adult websites. Install Photo Guard Pro immediately to stop this.

emails.email_subject: STALKER is tracking your location
emails.email_snippet: GPS ALERT: Someone is tracking your every move through your phone. They know where you are RIGHT NOW. Install Location Guard to stop tracking.

emails.email_subject: Your microphone is recording conversations
emails.email_snippet: AUDIO BREACH: Hackers are listening to your conversations through your device microphone. Install Mic Guard Pro to mute and protect.

emails.email_subject: Your text messages are being INTERCEPTED
emails.email_snippet: SMS BREACH: Someone is reading all your text messages including bank codes. Install SMS Guard Pro to encrypt your communications.

emails.email_subject: All your phone calls are being RECORDED
emails.email_snippet: CALL INTERCEPTION: Your phone calls are being recorded and stored by hackers. Install Call Guard Pro to secure your conversations.

emails.email_subject: Your contacts are being used for SCAMS
emails.email_snippet: CONTACT BREACH: Hackers stole your contacts and are scamming your friends and family. Install Contact Guard Pro to warn them and protect yourself.

emails.email_subject: Your calendar was filled with SPAM events
emails.email_snippet: CALENDAR SPAM: Hackers added malicious events to your calendar. Clicking them will infect your device. Install Calendar Guard to remove them.

emails.email_subject: Your private notes are being READ
emails.email_snippet: PRIVACY BREACH: Someone is accessing your notes app and reading your passwords, PINs, and secrets. Install Notes Guard Pro immediately.

emails.email_subject: Your Bluetooth is being EXPLOITED
emails.email_snippet: BLUETOOTH BREACH: Hackers are using Bluetooth to access your device without your knowledge. Install Bluetooth Guard to block unauthorized connections.

emails.email_subject: Your NFC is being used to STEAL money
emails.email_snippet: CONTACTLESS FRAUD: Criminals are using NFC skimmers to steal money from your phone wallet. Install NFC Guard Pro to block unauthorized payments.

emails.email_subject: Your SIM card has been CLONED
emails.email_snippet: SIM SWAP ALERT: Hackers cloned your SIM and can receive your calls and texts. Your bank codes are compromised! Install SIM Guard immediately.

emails.email_subject: Your fingerprint data was STOLEN
emails.email_snippet: BIOMETRIC BREACH: Hackers extracted your fingerprint data and can unlock your devices. Install Biometric Guard to change your security settings.

emails.email_subject: Your Face ID was COMPROMISED
emails.email_snippet: FACE ID BREACH: Someone created a 3D model of your face to unlock your phone. Install Face Guard Pro to add extra security layers.

emails.email_subject: Your Smart TV is watching YOU
emails.email_snippet: SMART TV BREACH: Hackers accessed your TV camera and microphone. They can see and hear everything in your living room. Install TV Guard now.

emails.email_subject: Your Alexa is sending recordings to hackers
emails.email_snippet: SMART SPEAKER BREACH: Your Alexa is sending all conversations to unknown servers. Install Smart Home Guard to stop unauthorized data collection.

emails.email_subject: Hackers are controlling your THERMOSTAT
emails.email_snippet: SMART HOME BREACH: Someone is remotely controlling your thermostat. They could freeze your pipes or start a fire. Install IoT Guard immediately.

emails.email_subject: Your doorbell camera is being WATCHED
emails.email_snippet: CAMERA BREACH: Hackers are viewing your doorbell camera feed and know when you leave home. Install Camera Guard Pro to block access.

emails.email_subject: Your connected car was COMPROMISED
emails.email_snippet: VEHICLE BREACH: Hackers can unlock your car and track your location. They could even disable your brakes. Install Car Guard Pro immediately!

emails.email_subject: MEDICAL DEVICE: Critical security vulnerability
emails.email_snippet: HEALTH ALERT: Your connected medical device has a critical vulnerability. Hackers could interfere with its operation. Download Medical Guard now.

emails.email_subject: STRANGERS are watching through your baby monitor
emails.email_snippet: BABY MONITOR BREACH: Unknown users are accessing your baby monitor camera. Protect your child now by installing Monitor Guard Pro.

emails.email_subject: Your gaming account is being SOLD
emails.email_snippet: GAMING BREACH: Your Steam/Xbox/PlayStation account is listed for sale on hacking forums. All your games will be stolen. Install Gaming Guard now.

emails.email_subject: Your crypto wallet is being DRAINED
emails.email_snippet: CRYPTO ALERT: Hackers are transferring your cryptocurrency to unknown wallets. You have minutes to act. Install Crypto Guard Pro immediately!

emails.email_subject: Banking trojan stealing your money RIGHT NOW
emails.email_snippet: FINANCIAL EMERGENCY: A banking trojan is intercepting your transactions and redirecting money. Install Bank Guard Pro to stop the theft.

emails.email_subject: Someone filed taxes using YOUR identity
emails.email_snippet: TAX FRAUD ALERT: A criminal filed a fraudulent tax return using your SSN and is receiving your refund. Install Tax Guard Pro to report and protect.

emails.email_subject: Fake insurance claims filed in YOUR name
emails.email_snippet: INSURANCE FRAUD: Someone is filing false insurance claims using your identity. Your premiums will skyrocket. Install Insurance Guard to stop them.

emails.email_subject: Someone is working using YOUR identity
emails.email_snippet: EMPLOYMENT FRAUD: A criminal is working using your SSN. The IRS thinks you owe taxes on income you never earned. Install ID Guard Pro now.

emails.email_subject: WARRANT issued for your arrest - Identity theft
emails.email_snippet: LEGAL ALERT: A warrant was issued in your name for crimes committed using your stolen identity. Install Legal Guard Pro to clear your name.
